$WmMPID_闇ディミトリ,ch17_03_Dimitri_M_Dark04,Face|I will tear your heads from your
shoulders in tribute to the dead.$k$p$WmMPID_伝承クロード,ch17_04_Claude_M_Legend01,Face|As class reunions go, this one has
to be the worst in history.$k$p$WmMPID_伝承エーデルガルト,ch17_02_Edelgardr_F_Legend01,Face|I recall... Seeing them here before.
Truly a shame.$k$p
